fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3

Class HEMSimulationSupervisor

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.AbstractComponent
      • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
        • fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.hem2020e3.HEMSimulationSupervisor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    fr.sorbonne_u.components.ComponentI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.interfaces.CyPhyComponentI

    public class HEMSimulationSupervisor
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.AbstractCyPhyComponent
    The class HEMSimulationSupervisor defines the component used in the HEM example to execute the simulation supervisor.

    Description

    Invariant

     invariant      true

    Created on : 2020-12-21

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant

      • createArchitecture

        protected fr.sorbonne_u.components.cyphy.plugins.devs.architectures.ComponentModelArchitecture createArchitecture()
                                                                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
        create the simulation architecture over the components.

        Description

        The architecture shows how models are projected onto components and how to interconnect them. Thanks to the DEVS property that models are closed under composition, even coupled models on each component can be seen at this level as atomic models.

        Contract

         pre    true            // no precondition.
 post   true            // no postcondition.
        Returns:
        the component simulation architecture for the example.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - to do.
